title._content: Image taken from page 341 of '[Biblical Researches in Palestine, Mount Sinai, and Arabia Petræa. A journal of travels in the year 1838, by E. Robinson and E. Smith ... Drawn up from the original diaries, with historical illustrations, by E. Robinson.]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[Biblical Researches in Palestine, Mount Sinai, and Arabia Petræa. A journal of travels in the year 1838, by E. Robinson and E. Smith ... Drawn up from the original diaries, with historical illustrations, by E. Robinson.]", "Bible. Appendix. Miscellaneous" Author: ROBINSON, Edward - D.D Contributor: SMITH, Eli - American Missionary Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 010077.k.13." Volume: 01 Page: 341 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1867 Edition: Third edition, with new maps and plans. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003123422 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
